Module com.example.emotionalsongs
Package com.example.emotionalsongs

Class Emozioni

java.lang.Object
com.example.emotionalsongs.Emozioni
public class Emozioni extends Object
Emozioni class implements on the application all of function for the management of the choice * of emotion and the management of evaluation
Author:
Mattia, Edoardo, Matteo, Tode

  • Method Details

    • Add

      public void Add(int[] valutazioni, String[] opinioni, int idCanzione, int idUtente)
      Add method allows the user to add a rating and add an opinion, printing all in an existing file Emozioni.dati.csv, or in a new file if doesn't exist, and make the recalculation of the media
      Parameters:
      valutazioni - get the evaluation of songs
      idCanzione - get the id of current songs
      opinioni - get the opinion of a song
      idUtente - get the current userID

    • getMedia

      public double[] getMedia(int id)
      GetMedia method take the media of the evaluation of the chosen song
      Parameters:
      id - get the current userID
      Returns:
      the media of evaluations

    • getValutazioni

      GetValutazioni method take the evaluation of the chosen song
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an array of evaluations
